original: Liss, Olof, överlärare, Vänersbon:, f. 10/1/98 i Gagnef, Kopparb. 1., av Liss Anders Andersson o. Marta Pers-dtr. G. 27 m. Anna Bengtsson. — Folkskolhex. i Upps. 19. Ord. folkskoll. i Skoghall 21-36, timlär. v. Skoghalls komm. mellansk. 19-34, tf. överlär. i Hammarö skoldistr. 33-35, överlär. i Vassända-Naglums skoldistr. 37-44, i Vänersborgs stad sed. 45. Tidvis tjg. som folksk :insp. i Älvsb. norra insp :område. Rev. f. komm. räkensk. i Hammarö 25-36, i Vassän-da-Naglum 38-39, led. av Hammarö komm:fullm. 35-37, ordf. i Blåsuts byggn-.nd 38-44, i Vänersb. ungd:råd 46. Medl. i Frimurarorden o. Rotary.
translated: Liss, Olof, senior teacher, native of Vänersborg, born on January 10, 1898 in Gagnef, Kopparberg County. Son of Liss Anders Andersson and Marta Persdotter. Married on the 27th of a month in an unknown year to Anna Bengtsson. Completed elementary school teacher training in Uppsala in 1919. Taught at Skoghall regular primary school from 1921 to 1936, and served as a substitute teacher for Skoghalls municipality middle school from 1919 to 1934. Was acting senior teacher in the Hammarö school district from 1933 to 1935, and appointed senior teacher in the Vassända-Naglum school district from 1937 to 1944. Finally, became senior teacher in Vänersborg city from 1945 onwards. Also served as periodic inspector of elementary schools in the northern inspection area of Älvsborg. Worked as a member of the auditing committee for Hammarö from 1925 to 1936 and for Vassända-Naglum from 1938 to 1939. Was a member of the Hammarö municipal council from 1935 to 1937 and chairman of the Blåsut building association from 1938 to 1944, as well as chairman of the Vänersborg youth council in 1946. A member of the Freemasonry Order and Rotary.
